mapper.select:
select distinct ChimerDB_Type, Source, webSource , Fusion_pair , if( instr(5Gene_Junction, "NA") > -1, if( substring_index(5Gene_Junction,":",-1) = "NA", "", substring_index(5Gene_Junction,":",-1) ) , 5Gene_Junction ) as gene5Junc , if( instr(3Gene_Junction, "NA") > -1, if( substring_index(3Gene_Junction,":",-1) = "NA", "", substring_index(3Gene_Junction,":",-1) ) , 3Gene_Junction ) as gene3Junc , H_gene , if(H_chr = "NA","",H_chr) as H_chr , H_position , if(H_strand = "NA","",H_strand) as H_strand , T_gene , if(T_chr = "NA","",T_chr) as T_chr , T_position , if(T_strand = "NA","",T_strand) as T_strand , Genomic_breakpoint, Exon_breakpoint , if(Breakpoint_Type = "NA", "", Breakpoint_Type) as Breakpoint_Type , Genome_Build_Version , H_tanscript, H_exon, T_tanscript, T_exon , if(PMID = "NA","",PMID) as PMID , if(Disease = "NA","",Disease) as Disease , Validation , if(Frame = "NA","",Frame) as Frame , Chr_info, H_locus, T_locus, Kinase, Oncogene, Tumor_suppressor, Receptor , Transcription_Factor, ChimerSeq, ChimerPub from ChimerDB3.ChimerKB_ver5 where 1=1
and H_gene = "${dataForSearchType}"
and T_gene = "${dataForSearchType}"
and H_gene = "${dataForSearchType}" or T_gene = "${dataForSearchType}"
and Fusion_pair = "${dataForSearchType}"
and Disease like "%${dataForSearchType}%"
and webSource in (${queryForWebSource}) and Breakpoint_Type in (${queryForBreakPointType}) and Validation in (${queryForValidationMtd}) and (${queryForFilterByFunc}) and Chr_info in (${queryForFusType}) and (${queryForSupInfo}) ;
